decisions.description: Note: No alert is fired for the True path since alerting is handled in the subflow.

decisions.label: Assignment Group Member User ID Is Null

decisions.description: Call In & Live Chat are not reassigned (since they're typically stamped after the fact).
decisions.name: dec_IsCallInOrLiveChat
decisions.label: Is Call In or Live Chat

rules.name: outReassignYes
rules.conditionLogic: 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR (4 AND (5 OR 6) AND (7 OR 8))
rules.label: Yes

decisions.name: dec_RecentPurchaseOrOpenOpportunityWithActiveOwner
decisions.label: Recent Purchase or Open Opportunity (with Active Owner)

Flow.description: Removed Queue Assignment Processing from Determine Assignment Type decision. Explicitly added Assignment Group to the Determine Assignment Type decision. This version created in order to allow Copado to select the most recent and applicable version.

formulas.name: fx_IsMQL
formulas.expression: IF( ( ISCHANGED({!$Record.Last_MQL_Date__c}) || ( ISBLANK({!$Record__Prior.Id}) && NOT(ISBLANK({!$Record.Last_MQL_Date__c})) ) ), TRUE, FALSE )

formulas.name: fx_OwnerName

Flow.label: Contact - After Save - Assign MQL

recordUpdates.description: Assumes the Name is trimmed and ready for use as an ID for this assignment.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Contact_Assign_to_Assignment_Name
recordUpdates.label: Update Contact - Assign to Assignment Name

subflows.label: Send Slack to Channel About User

subflows.label: Send Slack (Missing Slack ID for Assignment Group Member)

subflows.label: Send Slack (Missing Slack ID for Owner)

textTemplates.name: txt_SlackMessageMissingAttributes
textTemplates.text:
:error-triangle: *MQL Assignment Failure*
> *What* > An MQL assignment for <{!$Setup.Instance_Configuration__c.Instance_URL__c}/{!$Record.Id}|{!fx_Name}> was triggered based on Last MQL Date; however, it's missing key attributes (Last MQL Brand and/or Last MQL Type) to assign the record. > > *Last MQL Brand:* {!$Record.Last_MQL_Brand__c} > *Last MQL Type:* {!$Record.Last_MQL_Type__c} > > :marketo-2: <{!$Setup.Instance_Configuration__c.Instance_URL__c}/apex/mkto_si__Marketo_Lead_Detail?objType=Lead&objId={!$Record.Id} |View in Marketo> > :salesforce-2: <{!$Setup.Instance_Configuration__c.Instance_URL__c}/{!$Record.Id} |View in Salesforce> > > *Impact* > The record was not assigned because these fields are used in the assignment logic (and blank values are not supported). > > *Investigation Required* > 1. Assign the record to the relevant user. > 2. Review the scenario with Marketing Operations to ensure that MQL fields are populated for all MQLs.

textTemplates.name: txt_SlackMessageMissingSlackIDAssignmentGroupMember
textTemplates.text:
:error-triangle: *Missing Slack ID*
> *What* > A Lead was round robined via an Assignment Group; however, the assignee's Slack ID was blank. > > *User* > <{!$Setup.Instance_Configuration__c.Instance_URL__c}/{!sub_GetAssignmentGroupMember.var_AssignmentGroupMemberUserID} |{!sub_GetAssignmentGroupMember.var_AssignmentGroupMemberUserName}> > > *Impact* > The record was assigned; however, the Slack notification did not fire. > > *Investigation Required* > 1. Add the user's Slack ID in Salesforce. > 2. Escalate this to Business Systems and/or Transformation to address the root cause and prevent it from happening again.

textTemplates.name: txt_SlackMessageMissingSlackIDOwner
textTemplates.text:
:error-triangle: *Missing Slack ID*
> *What* > New non-MQL Inbound Requests normally trigger an alert to the record owner; however, the owner's Slack ID was blank. > > *User* > <{!$Setup.Instance_Configuration__c.Instance_URL__c}/{!$Record.OwnerId} |{!fx_OwnerName}> > > *Impact* > The Slack notification did not fire. > > *Investigation Required* > 1. Add the user's Slack ID in Salesforce. > 2. Notify the user of the Inbound Request. > 3. Escalate this to Business Systems and/or Transformation to address the root cause and prevent it from happening again.

textTemplates.name: txt_SlackMessageNoQueue
textTemplates.text:
:error-triangle: *MQL Assignment Failure*
> *What* > No queue was found with the {!sub_GetAssignmentSetting.var_AssignmentName} name. > > :salesforce-2: <{!$Setup.Instance_Configuration__c.Instance_URL__c}/{!$Record.Id} |View in Salesforce> > > *Impact* > The record was not assigned. > > *Investigation Required* > 1. Assign the record to the relevant user or queue. > 2. Review the queues and Assignment Settings to determine what went wrong.

textTemplates.name: txt_SlackMessageToChannel
txt_SlackMessageToUser
txt_SlackMessageUnhandledFault
textTemplates.text:
:error-triangle: *MQL Assignment Failure*


> *What* 

> An unhandled fault occurred.

> 

> :marketo-2: <{!$Setup.Instance_Configuration__c.Instance_URL__c}/apex/mkto_si__Marketo_Lead_Detail?objType=Lead&objId={!$Record.Id} |View in Marketo>

> :salesforce-2: <{!$Setup.Instance_Configuration__c.Instance_URL__c}/{!$Record.Id} |View in Salesforce>

> 

> *Fault Message*

> {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

> 

> *Investigation Required*

> 1. Assign the record to the relevant user.

> 2. Review the scenario with Marketing Operations to ensure that MQL fields are populated for all MQLs.
